languages.text: "Значит, молитвы были слабыми. Приказываю начать коллективный молебен духам машины".

traits.locale_text: "Значит, молитвы были слабыми. Приказываю начать коллективный молебен духам машины".

languages.text: "Then your praying has been too feeble. I order you to begin a collective prayer to the machine spirits."
languages.original_text: "Значит, молитвы были слабыми. Приказываю начать коллективный молебен духам машины".

traits.locale_text: "Then your praying has been too feeble. I order you to begin a collective prayer to the machine spirits."
"Then your praying has been too feeble. I order you to begin a collective prayer to the machine spirits."
"Then your praying has been too feeble. I order you to begin a collective prayer to the machine spirits."
"Then your praying has been too feeble. I order you to begin a collective prayer to the machine spirits."
"Then your praying has been too feeble. I order you to begin a collective prayer to the machine spirits."
"Then your praying has been too feeble. I order you to begin a collective prayer to the machine spirits."

languages.text: «Entonces sus plegarias han sido demasiado superficiales. Ordeno que recen colectivamente a los espíritus máquina».
languages.original_text: "Then your praying has been too feeble. I order you to begin a collective prayer to the machine spirits."

traits.locale_text: «Entonces sus plegarias han sido demasiado superficiales. Ordeno que recen colectivamente a los espíritus máquina».

languages.text: 「では、祈りが弱すぎるのだ。集団で機械精霊に祈りを捧げるよう命じる」
languages.original_text: "Then your praying has been too feeble. I order you to begin a collective prayer to the machine spirits."

traits.locale_text: 「では、祈りが弱すぎるのだ。集団で機械精霊に祈りを捧げるよう命じる」

languages.text: “那是因为你的祈祷太软弱了，我命令你们所有人集体向机魂祈祷。”
languages.original_text: "Then your praying has been too feeble. I order you to begin a collective prayer to the machine spirits."

traits.locale_text: “那是因为你的祈祷太软弱了，我命令你们所有人集体向机魂祈祷。”

languages.text: "Dann habt Ihr zu schwach gebetet. Ich befehle Euch, ein kollektives Gebet zu den Maschinengeistern zu beginnen."
languages.original_text: "Then your praying has been too feeble. I order you to begin a collective prayer to the machine spirits."

traits.locale_text: "Dann habt Ihr zu schwach gebetet. Ich befehle Euch, ein kollektives Gebet zu den Maschinengeistern zu beginnen."

languages.text: « Il faut croire que vos prières manquent de conviction. Je vous ordonne de lancer une oraison collective à l'attention des esprits de la machine. »
languages.original_text: "Then your praying has been too feeble. I order you to begin a collective prayer to the machine spirits."

traits.locale_text: « Il faut croire que vos prières manquent de conviction. Je vous ordonne de lancer une oraison collective à l'attention des esprits de la machine. »

languages.text: "Demek ki duaların yetersiz kalmış. Hep birlikte makine ruhlarına dua etmeye başlamanızı emrediyorum."
languages.original_text: "Then your praying has been too feeble. I order you to begin a collective prayer to the machine spirits."
